title: Rush Attack
content:
with the following Weapons:

Glaives Halberds Longswords Pikes Spears Tridents

Rush Attack Tips & Notes

Although they aren't listed, this attack gains any bonus damage normally applied to melee attacks. This can be used by any Class wielding a weapon, as long as they have the proficiencies for that weapon and the weapon should have the associated skills with it. Other Notes & Tips go here.
